metadataAttributes.Title: Data Visualization and Dashboards with Excel and Cognos
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Learn how to create data visualizations and dashboards using spreadsheets and analytics tools. This course covers some of the first steps for telling a compelling story with your data using various types of charts and graphs. You'll learn the basics of visualizing data with Excel and IBM Cognos Analytics without having to write any code.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Microsoft Excel,Data Analysis,Data Visualization (DataViz),IBM Cognos Analytics,Dashboard,
